description: A creamy and aromatic curry with a smooth finish and a delicate balance of spices.
name: Indian Curry with Kaffir Lime Leaves Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 leaves kaffir lime leaves, finely chopped
1 medium white onion, peeled and diced

recipeInstructions.text: Fry the chicken on a large nonstick pot on medium heat for 4 minutes while turning. Add the herbs and spices to the pan and fry while stirring for another 3 minutes.
Add the onion, garlic broccoli, snow peas, green beans and chillies and continue to fry for a further 2 minutes.

Add the coconut milk and the rest of the ingredients and allow to simmer while covered and stirring occasionally for 20 minutes. Remove the lid and cook while stirring for 10 minutes to reduce the sauce before serving.
